price: Kuma zuwa ga Samũdãwa (an aika) ɗan'uwansu Sãlihu. Ya ce: "Ya mutãnena! Ku bauta wa Allah. Bã ku da wani abin bautãwa fãce Shi. Shĩ ne Ya ƙãga halittarku daga ƙasa, kuma Ya sanya ku mãsu yin kyarkyara a cikinta. Sai ku nẽme Shi gãfara, sa'an nan kuma ku tũba zuwa gare Shi. Lalle Ubangijina Makusanci ne Mai karɓãwa."
arabic: ۞ وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥۖ هُوَ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱسۡتَعۡمَرَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوهُ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي قَرِيبٞ مُّجِيبٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ilā thamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥan qāla yāqawmi uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu huwa ansha-akum mina al-arḍi wa-is'taʿmarakum fīhā fa-is'taghfirūhu thumma tūbū ilayhi inna rabbī qarībun mujībun
